name: Car Fight Multiplayer Battle
description:
Join many of online players in an open multiplayer war using fast armored cars!, Choose your car and driver, Start fighting! Skills in heavy drifting are mandatory to win!
Features:
- Online/Offline Mode
- Death Trap Mode
- Private Rooms
- Health/Attack/Defense Pick ups
- Machine Guns
- Rockets
- 4 Different Maps
- 8 Different Cars
Crush that metal, make it twisted and crunched while driving like a champion, a lot of new updates are coming, stay tuned!
